rationale: Endemic to Lake Malawi and its catchment, the Upper Shire River, and Lake Malombe. There has been a significant population decline in the southern part of Lake Malawi due to commercial fisheries but the population as a whole is less impacted throughout the rest of its range.
evaluator: Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)
